strategy: Dark Mechanicus armies have a Strategy Rating of 3.
Initiative: All Traitor Titan formations have an Initiative Rating of 1+. All other formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army from the Traitor Titan Legions with Dark Mechanicus support.

sections.name: Battle Titan Formations
sections.description: A TTL army must contain at least one Chaos Emperor or Chaos Warlord Titan. Army may not Mix Nurgle/Tzeench or Slaanesh/Khorne formations.

formations.name: 0-1 Chaos Emperor Titan
formations.units: One Vicebringer Titan of Slaanesh / Gloombringer Titan of Nurgle / Strifebringer Titan of Khorne / Changebringer Titan of Tzeench

formations.name: Chaos Warlord Titan
formations.units: One Painlord Titan of Slaanesh / Plaguelord Titan of Nurgle / Banelord Titan of Khorne / Warplord Titan of Tzeench

formations.name: Chaos Reaver Titan
formations.units: One Reviler Titan of Slaanesh / Repugnant Titan of Nurgle / Ravager Titan of Khorne / Mutator Titan of Tzeench

sections.name: Scout Titan Formations
sections.description: Three for each Chaos Emperor Titan, two for each Chaos Warlord Titan. Army may not Mix Nurgle/Tzeench or Slaanesh/Khorne formations.

formations.name: Chaos Warhound
formations.units: One Plaguehound of Nurgle / Bloodhound of Khorne / Warphound or Tzeench
extraUnits: Add one Chaos Warhound of the chosen type: 225 points

sections.name: Daemon Engine Formations
sections.description: Three for each Battle Titan, one for each unit in a Scout Titan formation. Army may not Mix Nurgle/Tzeench or Slaanesh/Khorne formations.

sections.name: Hell-Forge and Chaos Navy Allies
sections.description: Up to a fourth of the points available may be spent on these formations

formations.name: Hell-Forge Support (Chaos Undivided)
formations.units: Four Chaos Squats, two Hades Land Raiders

formations.name: Ordinatus Hereticus Minoris (Chaos Undivided)
extraUnits: Add one Ordinatus Hereticus Minoris: 125 points

sections.name: Daemon Pool
sections.description: Any amount may be spent on Daemon Pool points

formations.name: Lesser Daemon Pool
formations.units: Any amount of Lesser Daemon Pool points. In addition, add one point to the Lesser Daemon Pool for each Eye of the Gods and Daemonic Herald upgrade.

upgrades.title: Traitor Titan Legion Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation.

items.name: 0-1 Eye of the Gods
items.description: Add one Eye of the Gods character to the formation

items.name: Daemonic Herald
items.description: Add one Daemonic Herald character to the formation. May not be combined with Eye of the Gods
